other_tests.findings: All 6 patients were negative on screening with [123I]MIBG.
3 of 4 who were screened showed positive uptake.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Positive scans indicated areas of increased uptake in the orbit and other regions.

other_tests.findings: Histology confirmed metastatic carcinoid tumor in various patients.
Patients responded well to external beam radiotherapy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Clinical and hormonal improvement was observed in treated patients.

other_tests.findings: Substantial shrinkage of hepatic lesions and clinical improvement.
